title: Chicken breast parcels with olives and raisins
ingredients: ['4 chicken breast fillets', 'salt and pepper to taste', '10 black olives, finely chopped', '3 tablespoons raisins or sultanas', '2 tablespoons tomato puree', '3 tablespoons olive oil', '2 tablespoons fresh basil, finely chopped', '1 tablespoon white wine vinegar']
